Best air purifier for apartment allergies?

Dust and seasonal allergies are killing me in a small space. What specs actually matter and what models are good value in 2025?

fitness cycling gear
X Facebook LinkedIn Copied!
Helen Kim
January 12, 2025 at 01:00 AM

2 Answers

Top Answer
28

Fit first: a cheap bike that fits beats an expensive one that doesn’t. Prioritize gearing appropriate for your hills. A 105 groupset is great value; wheels can be upgraded later.

Ben T
May 27, 2025 at 06:34 PM
5

Don’t forget padded shorts and a basic repair kit. Comfort prevents quitting.
